data:
If appropriately configured, Grai can send emails for a variety of purposes including reseting passwords and inviting new users.
Emails are setup for you with Grai cloud, making it easy to get started.
data.default-configuration#Default Configurat:
The Web App depends on the Django framework and works with a variety of email backends.
You can find additional information about these configuration settings in the core Django documentation, see https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/4.1/topics/email/.You will need to set the following environment variables:
Variable	Value	EMAIL_BACKEND	django.core.mail.backends.console.EmailBackend	EMAIL_FROM	Email address your emails will arrive from
data.aws-ses-email#AWS SES Email:
If you would like to use AWS's SES service to provision your emails you'll need to configure a few
additional environment variables.
See https://aws.amazon.com/ses/ for more details.

Variable	Value	AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID	Your AWS access key id	AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY	Your AWS secret access key	AWS_SES_REGION_NAME	The AWS region for SES	AWS_SES_REGION_ENDPOINT	The AWS SES region endpoint
